experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Reduced time to render user buddy lists by 75% by implementing a prediction algorithm.
Integrated iChat with Spotlight Search by creating a tool to extract metadata from saved chat transcripts and provide metadata to a system-wide search database.
Re.designed chat file format and implemented backward compatibility for search.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Designed a UI for the VS open file switcher (Ctrl-Tab) and extended it to tool windows.
Created a service to provide gradient across VS and VS add-ins, optimizing its performance via caching.
Built an app to compute the similarity of all methods in a codebase, reducing the time from O( n2 ) to O( n log n ).
Created a test case generation tool that creates random XML docs from XML Schema.
Automated the extraction and processing of large datasets from legacy systems using SQL and Perl scripts.

projects.title: Multi-User Drawing Tool
projects.description: Developed an electronic classroom where multiple users can simultaneously view and draw on a chalkboard with each person's edits synchronized.

projects.title: Synchronized Desktop Calendar
projects.description: Developed a desktop calendar with globally shared and synchronized calendars, allowing users to schedule meetings with other users.
